entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Shelburne Sandy Point 12:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

Humidity: 84 %

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain mixed with snow. Low zero with temperature rising to 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain mixed with snow beginning overnight. Fog patches overnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight then increasing to 40 gusting to 60. Low zero with temperature rising to 7 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain at times heavy. High 11.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 40 to 50 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 90 in the morning then becoming southwest 50 gusting to 90 in the afternoon. High 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers in the evening and after midnight. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023
